name: Swap Meat
description:
Become the perfect host for a powerful symbiote. Take what is in others and place it in yourself. Do what it takes to be perfect. 

Swap Meat is a 3-4 person game of rapid anatomical theft.

Expected playtime: ~30 minutes 

Game Available on Tabletopia:

 https://tabletopia.com/playground/meat-swap-p9xpkx/play-now
